titles.title: Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: This resolution elects designated members to standing committees of the House of Representatives and specifies certain members' ranking on certain committees. The resolution concerns the Committee on Appropriations, the Committee on Energy, the Committee on Rules, and the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
